CSGO is like fine wine, It takes time to appreciate. When I first started CSGO I was like a deer in headlights, having come from CoD and other similar games the change of pace was jarring. But, after putting 100 or so hours in, I can say that this is a really fun FPS, with a very high skill ceiling, and for that reason I love it. I can hop on any other FPS and do decent, most people can, but with CS I am a complete noob. And honestly, that's really refreshing. 

8/10

There are less and less people on here, but those who are are a lot of fun to be around. There are actually a lot of girls who play, including myself, and almost all the guys are really chill and don't make a big deal out of it, so ladies, don't be afraid to play this one. I really can't express how much fun I've had with my lobbies here. Just make sure you play before midnight.
